name: Alien Effect
description:
Are we there yet? Imagine the distraught feeling of traveling back to earth when you stumble upon an Alien Horde which is progressing to annihilate humans and  occupy earth...

Each moment you beg that it ends, until...

 The alien masters appear seeking to annihilate all who don't serve the origins of Alien occupation.  

Survive the horde. You have one life!
